items.title: Market today: All eyes on Federal Reserve's policy decision
items.description: Share market today: The US Fed's policy decision later today will be a major trigger for markets globally. Apart from that, release of economic data in some Asian markets will also be investors' radar

items.title: Trading Strategy: Nifty Bank, Private Bank show bullish trend; key levels
items.description: The Nifty Private Bank Index is currently experiencing a strong bullish trend, with significant gains recorded over the past fortnight

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Jupiter Wagons, REC, Tata Motors, NTPC, Infosys
items.description: Stocks to watch today: Hindalco Industries is planning to enter the solar module manufacturing sector with a new plant in Mundra, Gujarat.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals mildly higher open for India; Fed decision in focus
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets were headed for a mildly positive open on Wednesday ahead of the US Federal Reserve's policy decision announcement later in the day.

items.title: Dividend, Bonus, Split: SAIL, Mazagon Dock, 56 others turn ex-date tomorrow
items.description: Shares of SAIL, Hindustan Copper, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, and 53 others will remain in focus during today's trading session as they will turn ex-dividend date tomorrow

items.title: Traders shy away from Modi-linked stocks in shift to defensive sectors
items.description: A few recent policy reversals highlight the element of uncertainty that investors must grapple with after a decade of certainty, as Modi increasingly leans on coalition partners

items.title: Hero Moto, Cipla, NTPC: Stock picks by Chandan Taparia for today, Sept 18

items.title: F&O Cues: Can Nifty hit 26K post Fed rate cut? Check FIIs, retail bets here
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 18: Foreign investors continue to hold bullish bets in Nifty, Bank Nifty; while retail investors have increased short positions. Here's what experts have to say.

items.title: Motilal Oswal stock jumps 7%; market cap nears Rs 50,000 crore mark
items.description: Thus far in the current calendar year 2024, the stock has zoomed 165 per cent, as compared to 15 per cent rise in the BSE Sensex, data shows.

items.title: New launches key to achieve sales guidance for real estate players: Antique
items.description: Antique expects large-to-mid real estate players to achieve 20 to 30 per cent growth in sales booking

items.title: ONGC, OIL rise up to 2.5% as govt cuts windfall tax on crude oil to nil
items.description: Govt cuts windfall tax to nil: On Tuesday, Centre scrapped windfall tax on crude oil from Rs 1,850 per tonne amid ease in oil prices

items.title: Mphasis, Infosys fall up to 6%, Nifty IT 3% ahead of Fed rate cut decision
items.description: The fall in IT stocks may also be attributed to a report which says Accenture Plc is planning to push back the bulk of its staff promotions by six months

items.title: REC shares gain over 3%: Here's what's fueling the 'Maharatna' stock today
items.description: REC shares have doubled the investors' money in the last one year with a surge of 121.09 per cent during the said period

items.title: DCM Shriram Industries gains 4% as BSE issues clears merger proposals
items.description: In August 2023, DCM Shriram Group approved a scheme of arrangement involving amalgamation of Lily Commercial Pvt. Ltd. with DCM Shriram Industries Ltd.
